description: Listen to this episode from The Joe Rogan Experience on Spotify. Joey Diaz is a stand-up comic and New York Times bestselling author. He's the host of the podcast "Uncle Joey's Joint with Joey Diaz," co-host of "The Check-In" with Lee Syatt, and author of "Tremendous: The Life of a Comedy Savage." www.joeydiaz.net Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
title: #2128 - Joey Diaz
